posts.post_content:
Posted By: 1880nonsports
nearly perfect - couple feather TOUCHES to 2 corners - superior color. I've never done this but I'm willing to listen to offers from someone that needs this card. It's not a fire sale. I would entertain cash and a trade of a somewhat lower grade T3 and/or a few cards I want. I'm pretty happy with it on the shelf where it lives. Of course a scan can be made for interested parties. Sometimes I may be a bit slow to respond but as long as the offer is reasonable I'll write back a yes or no...........
always friendly,
henry moses

(edited to add):

[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w155/mosesmr/turkeyred.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w155/mosesmr/turkeyred2.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: 1880nonsports
only a few emails - no offers - no problem.....
